description:
In the city of Ikebukuro, something else is beginning to move. Everyone that has gathered in Celty’s apartment discuss how to deal with the problems they’re each facing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Even a Chance Acquaintance Is Decreed by Destiny
Sode Suri Au mo Tashou no Fuchi
Tesadüfi Bir Tanışıklık Bile Kaderin İşidir
袖すりあうも多生の縁
